summary: Build a bond-investment website branded as FUNDGROWTH (inspired by WintWealth) as a full investment platform, intended for the domain fundgrowth.in.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Replace the logo with the uploaded image (fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png > fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png)

existing_features.title: Create a full bond-investment platform web app branded as "FUNDGROWTH", inspired by the look-and-feel and information architecture of https://www.wintwealth.com/, but with original UI assets and copy (no 1:1 cloning).
Implement authentication using Internet Identity, and gate platform features (e.g., investing/portfolio) behind sign-in while allowing public browsing of marketing pages and bond listings.

Add a bonds catalog with a structured data model (e.g., issuer, rating, tenure, coupon/yield, minimum investment, risk tags, status) and provide UI for browsing, filtering, sorting, and viewing details for a single bond.

Implement a mock investment flow for a selected bond: enter amount (respecting minimum investment), show an order review, confirm investment, and record the investment to the signed-in user’s portfolio.
Create a user dashboard showing portfolio summary and investment history, including totals (e.g., total invested) and a table of investments (bond, amount, date/time, status).

Add core marketing pages similar in scope to an investment platform homepage: Home (hero, value proposition, featured bonds), How it works, FAQ, and Contact/Support; keep all user-facing text in English.

Define and apply one coherent, original visual theme for FUNDGROWTH across the app (colors, typography, spacing, components), suitable for a finance/bonds brand; avoid default-looking styling and do not use a blue+purple palette.
Generate and use original static brand assets for FUNDGROWTH (logo and simple supporting illustrations/icons) and render them from frontend static assets (not via backend).

Provide a deployment handoff for the user’s domain fundgrowth.in: include a clear checklist/instructions inside the project (e.g., a DEPLOYMENT.md) describing how to point fundgrowth.in DNS to the deployed frontend/canister, including what records to create and where to find the required canister/URL values after deployment.

Replace the existing FUNDGROWTH logo used across the website with the user-provided uploaded image (logo.jpg), ensuring the updated logo appears anywhere the current logo is rendered (including the header and footer).

Replace the existing FUNDGROWTH logo asset at /assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png with the user-uploaded image file logo.png, and ensure all places that render the current logo show the updated image (including the header, footer, and marketing pages).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a full bond-investment platform website like WintWealth, branded as FUNDGROWTH (accounts, bond listings, investment flow, dashboards, etc.)
Connect/deploy the FUNDGROWTH website to the domain fundgrowth.in (including DNS/setup as needed)

Add basic admin/seed capabilities for bond listings so the app is usable without external integrations: provide a backend method to initialize/seed a default set of sample bonds on first run, and ensure the UI has meaningful content after deployment.
Replace the current FUNDGROWTH logo on the website with the user-provided (attached) logo asset, updating the relevant header/brand locations.
